channel.title: Comments for page "Smoke Bombs"
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Smoke Bombs"

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
you don't lose 40 ryo when you use it on a mission, you lose whatever bonus ryo you earn for taking a general mission.
if you took a general D rank, you'd lose 10 ryo, and so forth.
